### PR Description

Describe additions or fixes in this PR. This description is supposed go into Git history when merged.

### How to test

Add clear instructions for QA here.

#### What type of PR is this?

Prefix the PR title with one of the following.

- [CICD] - changes to pipelines, linter configs, GitHub configs, etc.
- [Common] - changes to shared code that affects Mac and Windows code
- [Mac] - changes to Mac code
- [Windows] - changes to Windows code

**Note: Remove this paragraph from the PR description when done.**

#### Which issue(s) does this PR fix?

##### This PR addresses one or more GitHub issues.

Link issues in the side bar under **Development** or mention them in the PR description, e.g. using the `Fixes #1234` notation.

#### This is a rogue PR.

In the side bar:
- Assignees: Add yourself.
- Labels: Add the appropriate platform labels (`macOS`, `Windows`, `ci/cd`).
- Projects: Add the hybrid project and set the status to `In progress`.
- Milestone: Add the target milestone.

**Note: Remove this paragraph from the PR description when done.**
